content: Where is the best place to store the results of screenings? for example, a screening for fall risk, depression (PHQ-9), or urinary incontinence. Observation? Condition if they are positive for the condition? We are also storing in a questionnaire but I want this specific data also stored in a more structured way for analytical use.
For assessment tool findings and results use Observation
This seems like one of the intended use cases of RiskAssessment, have you looked at that?
